qas.question: In the Xeer system, what are judges called?
What does xeer boggeyaal mean in English?
What does the Xeer system call attorneys?
By what term are witnesses known in the Xeer system?
What does the Xeer system call cops?

context: The Xeer legal system also requires a certain amount of specialization of different functions within the legal framework. Thus, one can find <a0_0>odayal<a0_0/> (judges), xeer boggeyaal (<a1_0>jurists<a1_0/>), guurtiyaal (detectives), <a2_0>garxajiyaal<a2_0/> (attorneys), <a3_0>murkhaatiyal<a3_0/> (witnesses) and <a4_0>waranle<a4_0/> (police officers) to enforce the law.
